forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 11C. Winds S at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
